display_name: Immediate-Release Ccbs (Nifir Or Dihir Or Verir Or Dltir) (Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2))
description: Participant taking IMMEDIATE-RELEASE CCBS = NIFIR OR DIHIR OR VERIR OR DLTIR within two weeks of the Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2) visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.
